channel.title: Safe Eating
channel.description:
Well, Everyone has heard it, "Safe-eating", the act of eating food whilst your hp is above the "KO" limit.
I think its bullshit people get flamed for it. I just take it as they wanna get free stuff from me and im denying it.
But recently, people use it as an excuse to run or tele, its become sad.
Safe eating is fine. Why would anyone wanna die for honor on a game predominantly played by 11-13 year olds?
Post your reasoning.

item.title: Safe Eating
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

Buzzy:

IMO, Complication is what makes things fun.

I like things predictable:

  1. Full rune - Pull out mage gear, Fire Blast.
  2. Mage - Pull out shortbow and arrows.
  3. Rangers - Leave them alone unless I have a full load of food.
  4. 3-itemer - Don’t waste my time.

Things get really EXCITING! when I meet a hybrid. But usually they screw up and end up with a high HP, so curse, bind, range.

Read full topic

item.title: Safe Eating
item.dc:creator: @Buzzy Buzzy
item.description:
@Buzzy wrote:

the fu superior:

It pisses me off when people call me a safer, i don’t want to die so that makes me a noob? Also teleporting, im done with that, since i started members ive realized there is no such thing as being able to get away safely anymore.

Lo. I always bring a varrock tele tab because of tkers and pjers. Other than that, I fight respectfully and smart =)[br][size=1]Posted on: August 04, 2007, 10:46:39 AM[/size][hr][quote=“xxlegitxx, post:23, topic:129835”]The only reason I would go member is so I could train faster. Maple bow + steel arrows at level 60 = slow leveling. P2P pking is much too complicated to be fun imo.[/quote]
IMO, Complication is what makes things fun.

Read full topic

item.title: Safe Eating
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

Buzzy:

I love safers, I never run from them. Anyone with half a brain knows that safe eating not only makes you look noobish, but also puts the safer at a disadvantage. If you eat every time you lose a tiny bit of health, you will lose the fight because if you save the food until you are down, you will have more time to fight, which means more time to kill. So, safers are noobs, but I’d never run from one.

When you’re at like level 50 and you’re going against a full load of swordies (maybe full rune also), it’s frustrating because you won’t be able to get a finisher on them before they run out of food.

Read full topic

item.title: Safe Eating
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

MastrChief:

They are complaining because you didn’t make yourself an easy kill by eating when you have like 2 health. Just ignore them, they are stupid.

Eating at 2 health isn’t safing. It’s eating at 50 health that really pisses people off.

item.title: Safe Eating
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

The concept of ‘safe-eating’ is stupid. Unless you’re planning on hitting them with a finisher when they’re unawares, it doesn’t matter when they eat. I personally don’t safe-eat, I just keep my health roughly 5 points above their max hit with a r2h or whatever depending on their fighting style.

Read full topic
